flawed_nl_solution:
On the first day, she will do 10 push-ups.
On the second day, she will do 10 + 5 = <<10+5=15>>15 push-ups.
On the third day, she will do 15 + 5 = <<15+5=17>>17 push-ups.
So, Geli will do a total of 10 + 15 + 17 = <<10+15+17=42>>42 push-ups in a week.
#### 42

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 17. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
